poem:
Title: "In The Arms of Unrest"

In the restless dawn of political play,
A net cast wide in digital decay,
Wragg's confession, a brave dismay,
In cold corridors of power, shadows sway.

Sarwar's call echoes, urgent and frail,
A plea for peace in the arms sale stale.
Yet, the blackened halls refuse to unveil,
Legal justifications, hidden without fail.
